thread.title: Analysis: further air strikes could follow in Syria

title: Analysis: further air strikes could follow in Syria
text:
Analysis: further air strikes could follow in Syria 4:39am EDT - 01:23 
Reuters Foreign Policy reporter Warren Strobel reports U.S. President Donald Trump was initially pushing for a much bigger strike on Syria, and has left open the possibility of further strikes if Bashar al-Assad is believed to have used chemical weapons again.   
Reuters Foreign Policy reporter Warren Strobel reports U.S. President Donald Trump was initially pushing for a much bigger strike on Syria, and has left open the possibility of further strikes if Bashar al-Assad is believed to have used chemical weapons again.  //reut.rs/2HzK0Qx
